content: dreamy baby booties ~ an exclusive dream in color design ~ materials pm place marker 1 skein dream in color classy with cashmere sm slip marker 70% superwash merino wool 20% cashmere instructions and 10% nylon 200 yds ≈ 4 oz skein shown in aquajet cuff us 6 4 mm dpn needles using yarn held doubled cast on 24 26 30 sts tapestry needle using 3 dp needles divide sts on each needle as follows 8 9 8 9 10 sts stitch markers work 5 rounds in k1 p1 rib then change to one gauge strand of yarn and work 15 rounds of k1 p1 rib 5 sts and 8 row per inch in st st instep top of foot finished measurements next round k8 9 10 sts k the next 8 8 10 0-3 mos 3-6 mos 6-9 mos sts turn work and slipping first st abbreviations k the next 7 7 9 sts work back and forth in garter stitch on these 8 k knit 8 10 sts always slipping first st p purl for 14 16 20 more row k2tog knit 2 together st stitch or stitches all text and images © dream in color yarn 2012 page 1 sides and bottom with new needle pick up and knit 7 9 10 sts across the side of the of the garter stitch instep flap being careful to pick up between garter ridges catching two strands on last pickup stitch go into the stitch below the stitch on your next needle so as to avoid a hole knit the next 8 9 10 sts onto the same needle you will now have 15 18 20 sts on the needle with new needle knit the next 8 9 10 sts and then with the same needle pick up 7 9 10 sts along other side of garter stitch instep flap in same fashion knit 4 4 5 sts place marker for center of toe knit last 4 4 5 sts you will now have 15 18 20 sts each on two needles and 8 8 10 sts on last needle knit next round and redivide your stitches as follows 12 14 16 sts across toe needle place marker in center of these stitches 13 15 17 stitches on other two needles center heel will be between these two needles center of heel now marks beginning of round knit 3 5 6 more rounds finishing decrease divide stitches by placing the toe needle stitches on begin decreasing as follows each of the other two needles evenly decrease round knit 1 ssk k to within 3 sts of center toe marker k2 decrease k1 slip marker k1 ssk kitchener stitch these stitches for the bottom of the bootie and weave in all ends knit to within 3 sts of center heel k2 decrease k1 knit one round decrease round work as above knit one round decrease round work as above the entire
